alert.note: Alert for Oahu in Honolulu (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 01 at 2:23PM HST until January 01 at 4:30PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM HST THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE ISLAND OF OAHU IN HONOLULU COUNTY... At 223 PM HST, radar and automated rain gauges indicated that heavy rain had temporarily eased, but additional heavy showers were approaching from the south. The Pali Highway town bound remains closed due to a landslide. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Flooding in drainages, streams, rivers, roads, properties, and other low-lying areas. Public road closures possible in some areas. Landslides are possible in steep terrain. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... southern and eastern portions of Oahu. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Stay away from streams, rivers, drainage ditches, and culverts, even if they are currently dry. Do not cross fast flowing or rising water in your vehicle, or on foot. Turn around, don`t drown.
